h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai
content: While this fight will be a tougher one than the previous optional bosses you've faced in the Hollow, the Centipede Guai still has some predictable attack patterns that you can soon anticipate and counter and win the day. It's still worth having anti-poison Curios and Antimiasma medicine on hand.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai'.
The content is as follows:
While this fight will be a tougher one than the previous optional bosses you've faced in the Hollow, the Centipede Guai still has some predictable attack patterns that you can soon anticipate and counter and win the day. It's still worth having anti-poison Curios and Antimiasma medicine on hand.
